DOC.brief_summary: This study aims to determine the possible effects of Acetyl Salicylic Acid (ASA) and Terbutalin on ART treatment.
DOC.brief_title: Use of Acetyl Salicylic Acid and Terbutalin in Assisted Reproductive Techniques (ART)
DOC.detailed_description: This study aims to determine the possible effects of ASA and Terbutalin on ART treatment.
DOC.criteria: Infertile women below 39 years of age Women who may react allergically to the drugs administered Women with hyperthyroid or IDDM Women who do not want to participate in the study Women who are unable to give informed, written consent.
